sentence.Network_en: The judge called the decision "a flagrant violation of international law"
sentence.Network_cn: 法官称这一决定是“对国际法的公然违背”。

sentence.Network_en: a flagrant abuse of human rights
Telling the story was a flagrant breach of trust.
sentence.Network_cn: 说谎是一种可耻的破坏信誉的行为.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'blazing, resplendent'): from French, or from Latin flagrant- 'blazing', from the verb flagrare

entry.tran: 骇人听闻的;罪恶昭彰的;公然的
entry.def: You can use flagrant to describe an action, situation, or someone's behaviour that you find extremely bad or shocking in a very obvious way.

example.ex: The judge called the decision 'a flagrant violation of international law'...
example.tran: 法官称这一决定是“对国际法的公然违背”。

example.ex: His failure to turn his attention to flagrant wastes of public money is inexcusable.
example.tran: 他未能注意到公共资金的公然浪费，这是不可原谅的。

means.word_mean: 1. conspicuously and outrageously bad or reprehensible;

auth_sentence.content: It will only ever tackle the most flagrant cases.
auth_sentence.res_content: It will only ever tackle the most flagrant cases.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It will only ever tackle the most flagrant cases.

auth_sentence.content: Flagrant health, health boiling over in fiery rapture.
auth_sentence.res_content: Flagrant health, health boiling over in fiery rapture.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Flagrant health, health boiling over in fiery rapture.

auth_sentence.content: This is a flagrant violation of the constitution.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is a flagrant violation of the constitution.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is a flagrant violation of the constitution.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+flagr火焰+ant表形容词→全部是火→大火的
flagr火焰+ant表形容词→燃烧的→罪恶像火一样燃烧→恶名昭彰的
con全部+flagr火焰+ation表名词→全部是火→大火灾

stems_affixes.value_cn: 极恶昭彰, 臭名远扬, 名目张胆
stems_affixes.word_buile: flagr火焰+ancy表名词→燃烧→罪恶像火一样燃烧→恶名昭彰
de加强+flagr火焰+ate使……→加大火焰→爆燃

sentences.en: their flagrant disregard of the rules
sentences.cn: 他们对规定的公然漠视

sentences.en: Telling the story was a flagrant breach of trust.
sentences.cn: 说谎是一种可耻的破坏信誉的行为。

sentences.en: The attack on civilians is a flagrant violation of the peace agreement.
sentences.cn: 袭击平民的举动公然违背了和平协定。
